ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Rogues and bards (was Why didn't I log out sooner?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heheheh, when I was 12th lvl and fighting at the Derv camp in WC, there was a second group also camping.  I would sing HOR, they would pull and the Dervs
ygData.messageBody:
--- "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
wrote:
> 1) They attack mob 2) I get within agro radius and
> put my hand near
> auto-attack key 3) mob turns on me and knocks me
> down to 80% heath 4) I
> scream "Get it off" 5) mob gets me down to 40%
> health and refuses to turn
> around 6) Groupmate hits mob with everything
> they've got (or attempts to
> heal me) 7) LOADING, PLEASE WAIT...

Heheheh, when I was 12th lvl and fighting at the Derv
camp in WC, there was a second group also camping. I
would sing HOR, they would pull and the Dervs would
aggro me. We were accused of kill stealing several
times...so when this would happen, I'd slap on selos,
run over to their party and and say (hotkey), "scuse
me, this yours" ;-)
